name: Bana Simulator
storyline:
The Bana's journey begins on the Shores of Isla Bana, where Apple, a prominent rebellion leader, tells you about the history of the Bana World. Apple explains how the former champion of all Banas eventually gained dark magical powers and became the tyrant king of the world! To prove the Bana's ability to Apple, he explores Isla Bana, learning it's secrets, meeting fun characters, and facing great foes!
After Apple has accepted the Bana into the rebellion, he gets a letter from the fruit who raised him, Granny Smith, explaining that his home island on the Lush Archipelago is under siege by the Shadow Bana and Apple's family is in grave danger... The Bana goes on his first great quest to save the Lush Archipelago, a much greater and more perilous location than Isla Bana. This journey is no easy feat, requiring the Bana to face off against many bosses, solve ancient puzzles and riddles, negotiate with a great cast of characters, and a few more surprises.
summary:
A hilarious bullet hell adventure where a Bana (sentient banana) goes on a quest with his friends to defeat the tyrant Shadow Bana and save the world!
Travel the world to collect treasures, build new weapons, vanquish numerous bosses, and more!
